==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|蝉|表}}

===Etymology===
A compound of [[蝉|semi]] (cicada) and [[表|omote]] (surface). The rattan surface was said to resemble the wings of a cicada.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[semiomote]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|せみおもて|kyu=蟬表}}

# A type of [[geta]] (sandal) in which the surface is made from [[rattan]].
#* 1895: にごりえ
#*: 女房は[...]狭帯きりゝと締めて'''蝉表'''の内職[...]

===Usage notes===
Also known as [[籐表|tōomote]], literary "rattan surface".

===Derived terms===
* {{l|ja|蝉表造}}
